tasks.task: Design and implement a vertical farm.
subtasks: Develop buildings that incorporate food production.
Utilize passive solar technologies in the buildings.
Integrate public and personal transportation solutions.
Encourage teleworking to reduce urban crowding.
Convert agricultural practices to reduce land use.
Cool urban areas to mitigate heat sinks.
Equip vertical farms with nano films for condensation.
Use nano membranes to filter and clean water.
Enhance crop effectiveness through genetic engineering.
Consider energy-efficient lighting solutions (e.g., fibre optics).
Assess the potential yield of vertical farms (e.g., 30-story building equals 10 km2 of outdoor space).

tasks.task: Evaluate the feasibility and challenges of vertical farming.
subtasks: Identify crops suitable for vertical farming.
Assess resistance from farmers and agribusiness.
Weigh the benefits against existing infrastructure improvements.
